changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_user_info') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_user_info GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_user_info @account_id dbo.id_t AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
-- character info. SELECT id, nickname, class, zone_id, pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, pos_heading, sex, current_level, level_step, exp, sp, hp, mp, cp, recovery_cp, character_state, chaotic, is_actionbar_lock, mercenary_point FROM dbo.Characters WHERE account_id = @account_id
-- last access character id SELECT ISNULL(character_id, 0) FROM dbo.Last_Access_Characters WHERE account_id = @account_id
-- Quest Item SELECT id, character_id, quest_item_code, usable_count, quest_code FROM dbo.Quest_Inventories WHERE account_id = @account_id
-- inventory SELECT id, character_id, inven_type, item_code, slot_id, item_count FROM dbo.Inventories WHERE account_id = @account_id
-- equip item SELECT character_id, inven_type, inventory_id, fragment_count, open_socket_count, socket_skill_code_1, socket_skill_code_2, socket_skill_code_3, socket_skill_code_4, socket_skill_code_5 FROM dbo.EquipItemInfos WHERE account_id = @account_id
-- equipment SELECT character_id, equip_part, inventory_id FROM dbo.Equipments WHERE account_id = @account_id
-- skill SELECT character_id, skill_code FROM dbo.Skills WHERE account_id = @account_id
-- action bar SELECT character_id, code_0, code_1, code_2, code_3, code_4, code_5, code_6, code_7, code_8, code_9 FROM dbo.ActionBars WHERE account_id = @account_id ORDER BY character_id, count_id
-- game money SELECT character_id, game_money, bank_game_money FROM dbo.GameMonies WHERE account_id = @account_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_user_info') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_user_info GO
